## BodyParser.supports() method

Indicate if the given media type is supported

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
supports(mediaType: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mediaType | <code>string</code> | Media type |

<b>Returns:</b>
